products.title: Turin 25mm Ocean Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Turin 25mm Ocean Blue Aluminium Venetian in Blue. Made to measure from £8.75 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Aluminium Venetian includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Introduce calming ocean blue shades into your space with our aluminium venetian blinds. An all-rounder that will work perfectly with cool greys or as a pop of colour with neutrals and wooden tones. Our 25mm venetian blinds offer a slim profile ensuring a sleek finish for your home or office.

products.title: Light Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Light Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.productdescription: The light blue aluminium venetian blind is a gentle balance between a soft pastel tone, and a stronger sky blue hue. This is ideal for areas of your home where you want to inject some colour, but without it dominating the space.  Keep your blinds looking their best with our easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Sky Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Sky Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.productdescription: The bright sky blue aluminium Venetian blind is a bold and punchy blind that will help to really brighten and enhance your room. Use this blind to filter the light entering your room, and give yourself the required privacy by simply tilting the slats.  Keep your blinds looking their best with our easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Royal Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: Royal Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.productdescription: Aluminium Venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with our easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Baby Blue Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: This Baby Blue Aluminium Venetian blind is perfect for adding a lighter colour to your room. Pair this in alongside whites, creams and darker blues to create a complimenting interior decor. Each of our aluminium Venetian blinds are made to measure just
products.productdescription: This Baby Blue Aluminium Venetian blind is perfect for adding a lighter colour to your room. Pair this in alongside whites, creams and darker blues to create a complimenting interior decor. Each of our aluminium Venetian blinds are made to measure just for you, and this blind comes with a matching headrail and bottom bar. Keep your blinds looking their best with our easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more
